# SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.Camera

**Enumeration**

Defines the camera feed the RealityView renders.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Camera
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.Camera.back**: The camera on the back of the device.
- **SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.Camera.front**: The camera on the front of the device.

## Spatial tracking

- **SpatialTrackingSession**: An object that incorporates spatial tracking capabilities into your RealityKit apps.
- **SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration**: A type for configuring the spatial tracking session.
- **SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.AnchorCapability**: A type that defines various anchor tracking capabilities.
- **SpatialTrackingSession.Configuration.SceneUnderstandingCapability**: Defines how system behaviors use scene understanding.
- **SpatialTrackingSession.UnavailableCapabilities**: A type that contains the unavailable capabilities of the current spatial tracking session.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
